name: Avelon
description:
Avelon is a third person fantasy world game. A soldier wakes up after loosing his army and being considered dead, within a remote village that's being attacked by monsters. As the soldier he is, he decides to stop the monsters by himself by defeating their leader. World

Explore a small village that lives on agriculture, filled with all different dangerous creatures.

Complete Quests

There are 4 soldiers in need. Help them in order to fulfill your goal and save the village.

Fight

Your sword will never let you down. Find better equipment hidden within the world, gather potions from monsters by defeating them. Find your path to their leader and save the village from their grasp.

Developers DARP Team 

Daniel Azevedo:  Gameplay Design, Player/NPC Models; 

André Lisboa : User Interface,  Audio Assets;  

Rafael Mordomo: Player Movement and Controls, Artificial Intelligence;

Pedro Perdigão: World Building, Map Design.

Theme: Fantasy. Genre: Action & Adventure
